common.notFoundDescription: The page you are looking for was not found.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Find the latest articles and stories to stay informed about the blood donation community.
blog.postNotFoundDescription: The blog post you are looking for might have been removed or is temporarily unavailable.
blog.donateMessage: Your donation can save up to three lives. Find donation centers near you.

metadata.description: Join our community of blood donors and save lives. Find blood donation campaigns, connect with donors, and respond to urgent blood requests in your area.
metadata.ogDescription: Connect with blood donors, organize donation campaigns, and help save lives. Join our growing community of blood donors across the region.
metadata.twitterDescription: Connect with blood donors, organize donation campaigns, and help save lives. Join our growing community of blood donors.
metadata.jsonLdDescription: A community platform connecting blood donors with those in need, organizing blood donation campaigns, and raising awareness about the importance of blood donation.

donation_benefits.title: Benefits of Blood Donation
donation_benefits.description: Donating blood is not only beneficial for those who receive it. Donors can also enjoy many advantages, such as:

freeHealthCheckUp.title: Free Health Check-Up
freeHealthCheckUp.description: In order to give blood, you're required to undergo a health screening. A trained staff member performs this checkup. They'll check your: pulse, blood pressure, body temperature, hemoglobin levels

improvedCardiovascularHealth.title: Improved Cardiovascular Health
improvedCardiovascularHealth.description: Donating blood can help reduce harmful iron stores. This can reduce the risk of heart disease. It can also reduce the risk of heart attack.

emotionalSatisfaction.title: Emotional Satisfaction
emotionalSatisfaction.description: Donating blood can help reduce harmful iron stores. This can reduce the risk of heart disease. It can also reduce the risk of heart attack.

reducedRiskOfCancer.title: Reduced Risk of Cancer
reducedRiskOfCancer.description: Donating blood can help reduce the risk of cancer. This is because it can reduce the risk of iron overload in the body.

ageAndWeight.title: Age and Weight
ageAndWeight.description: Donors must be between 18 and 65 years old and weigh at least 50 kg.

generalHealth.title: General Health
generalHealth.description: Be in good general health and not suffering from any diseases transmissible by blood.

donationFrequency.title: Donation Frequency
donationFrequency.description: Men can donate every three months, and women every four months.

map.title: Map of Regional Blood Transfusion Centers in Morocco!
map.search_placeholder: Search for a blood donation center...
map.legend_text: Click on a marker to see more information and get directions

popup.title: Join Our Blood Donation Community
popup.subtitle: Be part of a movement that saves lives through awareness and action

features.impact: Make a meaningful impact in your local community
features.connect: Connect with donors and people in need
features.notify: Get notified about urgent donation requests

award.title: Best Innovation Project
award.subtitle: Rotaract District 9010
award.description: We are proud to announce that tabarro3 has been recognized as the Best Innovation Project winner by Rotaract District 9010. This achievement reflects our commitment to revolutionizing blood donation awareness and connecting communities to save lives.

hero_description: Blood donation is a crucial act that saves lives daily. A single donation can help up to three people and is used in various medical situations, from surgeries to cancer treatments. By donating regularly, you play a vital role in maintaining a healthy blood supply for your community.
New_Campaigns_Description: Join upcoming blood donation campaigns in your area
No active campaigns at the moment. Check back later!
confirming_description: Are you sure you want to participate in the campaign
confirming_description_2: By confirming, you agree to attend the blood donation campaign at
Blood_Requests_Description: Current blood donation requests in your area

invitation.title: Accept Invitation
invitation.invalidMessage: This invitation link is invalid or has expired.
invitation.setupMessage: You've been invited to join. Please set up your account.

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.consentMessage: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and consent to receive notifications about blood donation needs in your region. Your information will be used to match you with local donation opportunities.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.resetInstructionsSent: If an account exists with this email, you will receive password reset instructions.
forgotPassword.tooManyAttempts: Too many password reset attempts. Please try again in {minutes} minutes.
forgotPassword.invalidOrExpiredLink: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
forgotPassword.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.

updatePassword.newPasswordMustBeDifferent: New password must be different from the current password.

validation.validEmailRequired: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

validation.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.validEmailRequired: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

signIn.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.

signUp.userAlreadyExists: User with this email already exists.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Manage your personal information and blood donation requests

bloodRequests.createRequestDescription: Create a new blood request with your requirements
bloodRequests.noRequests: No blood requests found. Click "New Request" to create one.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete this blood request. This action cannot be undone.

how_it_works_description: tabarro3 is a platform that connects blood donors with those in need. Here's how it works:
how_it_works_step1_description: Sign up and create your profile, providing your blood group and other necessary information.
how_it_works_step2_description: If you need blood, create a request specifying the blood group, contact info, and location.
how_it_works_step3_description: The system sends notifications to all compatible blood donors in the specified region via email.
how_it_works_step4_description: If you're a compatible donor, you'll receive a notification and can choose to help.

about.title: About tabarro3.ma
about.welcome: Welcome to tabarro3.ma, your dedicated source for awareness and promotion of blood donation in Morocco.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide accurate and detailed information about blood donation in Morocco. We believe that knowledge is essential to encourage more people to participate in this noble cause that saves lives.

simplified.title: Simplified Information:
simplified.description: We make information about blood donation easy to understand, covering everything from the donation process to eligibility criteria.

locations.title: When and Where to Donate:
locations.description: We provide you with practical details about blood donation locations in Morocco and opening hours.

news.title: Latest News:
news.description: Stay informed about the latest news, events, and initiatives related to blood donation across the country.

why.title: Why We Do This
why.description: Every drop of blood can save a life. By sharing this information, we hope to encourage each of you to become a regular donor and contribute to saving lives.

howToHelp.title: How You Can Help
howToHelp.description: Sign up on tabarro3.ma. Share our site with your loved ones, follow us on social media, and together, let's make every donor an ambassador for blood donation in Morocco.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions or collaboration, please don't hesitate to contact us at:

about.thanks: Thank you for being part of this vital mission.

eligibility.title: Blood Donation Conditions in Morocco
eligibility.description: Learn about the requirements and restrictions for blood donation to ensure the safety of both donors and recipients.
eligibility.basicRequirementsSubtitle: Essential criteria that all potential donors must meet
eligibility.temporaryDeferralsSubtitle: Please postpone your donation for the specified period if you fall into any of these categories

animalSerum.condition: Injection of serum of animal origin (e.g., tetanus serum, scorpion venom serum)

humanSerum.condition: Serological treatment of human origin: Anti-D, anti-tetanus globulin

cupping.condition: Cupping or shaved with a razor or blade at a barber

endoscopy.condition: Examination of the digestive tract (fibroscopy) or colon (colonoscopy)

eligibility.permanentDeferralsSubtitle: Please do not donate blood if you belong to any of these categories
eligibility.medicalDecisionSubtitle: Blood donation depends on the patient's health condition (doctor's decision)

medicalDecision.neurologicalDisorders: Neurological disease or neurological disorders (such as epileptic seizures)
medicalDecision.malaria: Living in areas known for malaria
medicalDecision.england: Lived in England for at least one year between 1980 and 1996
medicalDecision.unprotectedSex: Multiple sexual partners without using a condom

callToAction.title: Ready to Donate?
callToAction.description: If you meet all the requirements, find a donation campaign near you and help save lives.
